app.name: SoulFire Client
app.one_liner: A cross-platform frontend client for the SoulFire server, built with Tauri and modern web technologies.

core_loop: Users interact with the SoulFire server through a graphical interface that communicates via the official SoulFire gRPC API, enabling all server functionality to be accessible through both the GUI and direct API calls.

screens.name: Main Dashboard
screens.purpose: Provide access to core SoulFire server features and real-time interaction.

rust_commands.name: connect_to_server
rust_commands.purpose: Establish a connection to the SoulFire gRPC server endpoint.

mvp_plan: week 1: Set up Tauri project structure
week 1: Implement basic gRPC client communication
acceptance_tests: User can download and install the SoulFire Client on Windows x86_64 using the provided installer link.
User can launch the application and connect to a local SoulFire server instance.
open_questions: How are authentication credentials managed across platforms?
What is the fallback behavior when gRPC connection fails?
